column2: The time has come. The senate and more importantly, the people, have spoken their wishes to unite the peninsula. Italia shall be one, undivided and prosperous once again. But these rump states in south still cling on to their status quo and will not budge to unite any time soon. It is time to show them war. Sicilia delanda est!
The question of the holy see

The papacy has for long ruled over rome, ever since the year 759 AD. The heart of catholicism, this place holds tremendous value to the people of our nation and of many more. Thus, with the blessing of Pope Pius IX, the papal states shall now be subservient to Genoa. This will be our first step to restoring an old fantasy.
The Legend of Romulus and Remus

Romulus and Remus were abandonned at birth, left as orphans in the wilderness of the forest on the river Tiber. Romolus and Remus grew up nurtured by a she-wolf until adopted by shepherd as his sons. Faustulus was his name and alonside his wife they raised them into adulthood. The brothers then sought to found a city, but they disputed over it's location. This tension boiled over when Remus and his followers attacked Romolus, but the gods had chosen Romolus that day and Remus was killed. In the aftermath of this fratricide, Rome was to be founded in the XVIIIth century BC by Romolus. This story is now true once again, as we have vanquished our brothers in italia, we now will found not the city of Rome, but the state of Rome. Roma Eterna!

Rome must continue it's integration of italians into latin culture. The province of savoie has for long been occupied by the french speaking lower burgundians. This has now changed and they will once again call themselves roman.
It is time to weigh in on Greek affairs
We have pressed our claim over Graecia, it is now time to integrate greek culture into roman society.
After multiple decades of living side-by-side with greeks and conquering their homeland, It is now time to directly administrate the greek lands.

Our King has spoken, we have asserted our hold over southern italy and the papacy, now lays the Genoan Republic north to be vanquished in battle. Their decadent and pretentious state will be abolished and Italy shall be one.
Our people have now grown to be somewhat accustomed to speaking latin and using latin, but it is still in a transitory period of usage.
We are finally done with our transition into a classical latin society, we shall now enjoy a level of cultural unity in Italia that has never been seen before.
The Papacy has been under our subjugation for some time now, it is time that we integrate directly into our kingdom.
The Pheonix rose and an Eagle fell.
Rome was recently proclaimed in direct opposition to our Byzantine Empire, but the pretenders are no more, we control part of their lands and their people.
After our establishment as the sole and unique Rome, we must push north in the Italian peninsula and capture the remainder of the Roman territories.
Fire all minority bureaucrats and demote them to farmers and labourers, however this may affect our administrative effiency short-term.
Our isles are very interlinked with the Channel, this leads us to question whether or not we should establish Mare Britannicum as being under our firm control.
The Kurdish people are close brothers to the Persian people, we must consider them part of our society.

Our Empire had long held control over the Dalmatian coast, the Adriatic and its people. It is time to now establish our rule over the entirety of the Balkans and integrate their people in our society.
We must plan our raid ahead of time to make sure it is succesful.
The time right and we are now ready to go raid the filthy Mongols.

The Cossacks have been a thorn in our side for a long time now, but we have had little means to deal with them since we have been focusing with other matters. This has all changed now, our position is as secure as ever and we are in control of their towns, it is time to crush this insect.
Request control over the Cossack lands
With our influence over the Ukrainian lands unconteste we can proclaim the Ukrainian people as a part of our cultural hegemony over most of Eastern Europe.

The province of Africa, also refered to as Africa Proconsularis, was one of the central parts of the Roman Republic until the overtaking of the Ptolemaic Egypt in the year 30 B.C. This has led to us seeking out this province once again for a larger grain supply to feed our populus as we reimplement the grain dole not only in Rome but all across the country
The untamed plains of Pelsov remain open for territorial expansion, we must lay claim to it under the name of our God and country

The Pruthenians and the Wends have a long kinship with the Polish people, tracing back our origins to the same tribes and all 3 being catholics. It is now time to fully integrate them into our bureaucracy and state.
With the death of Duke Friedrich Kmiecik so goes the autonomy of the Silesian Duchy. As written in his will, the lands of the House of Kmiecik will be inherited to King Stanislaus of Jagiellon.
Uneasy Unification of the Jagiellon holdings
The Jagiellon holdings have for too long been disunited by old Personal Unions, this cannot last if we are to recover from the blow delt by the Bohemians.

Our King Stanislaus has been greatly influenced by the exploits of Kazimierz, the former Hetman Cossacks. This has sparked a fire within Stanislaus to cultivate a cultural bond between the Ruthenian people and the Poles. The move has garnered quite the attention from the Polish nobility which feel like he is neglecting his duties as the Polish king and instead focusing on some fantasy spurred on by a decrepit Kazimierz.
As we have conquered the West bank of the Dniper, we must push further and conquer the rest of the Ruthenian lands so that we may truly be considered protectors of the Ruthenians.

Our neighboring Germans have long been disunited by Petty Kingdoms and former princes of the HRE, this has left a power vacuum filled partly by the Hansa and the Dutch, but this influence is very fragile and we ought to get involved in this playground.
The lands of Holstein should be handled by the Pomeranians to facilitate adminstration and grow our client state's power.
With our influence over Hanover total, there is no one left to defend Hanover from our might. We shall seize Hanoverian lands and give it to our subjects in North Germany
Brunswick clearly stands in the way of our Elbian Hegemony, with our influence established over it we shall integrate it into Saxony
Gotha holds strategic importance to the defence of the Elbe and shall be integrated to Saxony
It has taken a long time but with our similarities in language, the Czechs are now properly integrated into Jagiellonian society and culture
